title: search
description: This is search object from the hsda-search service.

id.description: Each organization must have a unique identifier.

name.description: The official or public name of the organization.

alternate_name.description: Alternative or commonly used name for the organization.

description.description: A brief summary about the organization. It can contain markup such as HTML or Markdow.

email.description: The contact e-mail address for the organization.

url.description: The URL (website address) of the organization.

tax_status.description: Government assigned tax designation for for tax-exempt organizations.

tax_id.description: A government issued identifier used for the purpose of tax administration.

year_incorporated.description: The year in which the organization was legally formed.

legal_status.description: The legal status defines the conditions that an organization is operating under; e.g. non-profit, private corporation or a government organization.

id.description: Each location must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.description: Each location must belong to a single organization. The identifier of the organization should be given here.

alternate_name.description: An alternative name for the location.

transportation.description: A description of the access to public or private transportation to and from the location.

latitude.description: Y coordinate of location expressed in decimal degrees in WGS84 datum.

longitude.description: X coordinate of location expressed in decimal degrees in WGS84 datum.

id.description: Each service must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization that provides this service.

program_id.description: The identifier of the program this service is delivered under.

location_id.description: The identifier of the location where this service is delivered.

name.description: The official or public name of the service.

alternate_name.description: Alternative or commonly used name for a service.

status.description: The current status of the service.

interpretation_services.description: A description of any interpretation services available for accessing this service.

application_process.description: The steps needed to access the service.

wait_time.description: Time a client may expect to wait before receiving a service.

accreditations.description: Details of any accreditations. Accreditation is the formal evaluation of an organization or program against best practice standards set by an accrediting organization.

licenses.description: An organization may have a license issued by a government entity to operate legally. A list of any such licenses can be provided here.
